sentence.Network_en: My heartfelt sympathy goes out to all the relatives.
sentence.Network_cn: 我对所有的亲人表示由衷的慰问。

sentence.Network_en: We would like to take this opportunity to convey our heartfelt condolences to the families of the victims.

sentence.Network_en: There was surely in it a quality that was personal and heartfelt.
sentence.Network_cn: 其中确实有一种出自心底的个人因素.

entry.def: Heartfelt is used to describe a deep or sincere feeling or wish.
